#Introduction of OneSync

= What is *_OneSync_*? =

*_OneSync_* is a sync tool which makes use of free online storage such as [http://wiki.dropbox.com/ DropBox], [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File_Transfer_Protocol FTP] effectively utilizes online disk space to synchronize files/folders between computers.

= Is *_OneSync_* easy to use? =

We are on user side. *_OneSync_* will be the one of the easiest-to-use sync tool that will do everything without complex configuration. We hope that users will have great experience using *_OneSync_*.

= Will *_OneSync_* screw up my PCs? =
Well, if you are a normal user and use our sync tool correctly, you are assured that *_OneSync_* will not harm your PCs. However, if you use our sync tool in illegal methods, your PCs may be screwed up due to God's Will. 

= Is *_OneSync_* free? =
Of course, *_OneSync_* is free for all. However, if you feel our sync tool is good and intend to support us, you may make donation to us.
